name: Sphere Runner (James Dash)
description:
Make your way though ALL 5 levels!!

Please Use Full Screen!!

Controls:
Use the "a" and "d" keys to move left and right.
Use the "s" key to randomly change the colour of the ball.
Tap the ESC Key to pause and resume the game

Credits:
Music From: www.bensound.com

White city buildings used in game created by:    Ali Zanjiran   --    His Youtube Channel:                                                               https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKGKwkmZagsc0QKTkWn_w-w?view_as=subscriber

Enjoy!!
